short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Launch WordPress Plugin or Theme in Playground

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension to add playground button on wordpress.org plugins and themes. Playground button on page help to quickly launch plugin or theme for quick test drive.
